org.dotplot.tokenizer
Class DefaultConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.tokenizer.DefaultConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConfiguration
public class DefaultConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfiguration

Baseimplemtation of the IConfiguration - Interfaceses. It is used a Defaultscanner and a defaultFilelist

Constructor Detail

DefaultConfiguration

public DefaultConfiguration()
Creates a base configuration. This base configuration uses a simple DefaultScanner and a DefaultFileList.
